# Installing R
#### All versions of RStudio requires users to have R downloaded on before running RStudio. 
  * It can be downloaded here: https://cran.rstudio.com/
  * Click on **Download R for Windows**
  * Choose the *base* (to download R for this first time), and finally **Download R 3.6.0 for Windows**
    
\newpage
# Installing RStudio
#### Go to this link https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download
  * Scroll down to the Installers for Supported Platforms and choose the appropriate opperating system: 
  ![](~/Desktop/Welcome_A3SR/A3SR-Welcome-Package/Software Installation/Installation Images/RStudio_Installation_PC.png){width=75%}
  
    + For PC Users: Choose **RStudio 1.2.1335 - Windows 7+ (64-bit)**

# Installing LaTeX 
* Download MiKTeX from this link : https://miktex.org/download
  + Choose the **Howto: Install MikTeX on your Windows computer**
  + Press the Download icon at the bottom and the file will immediately begin downloading

![](~/Desktop/Welcome_A3SR/A3SR-Welcome-Package/Software Installation/Installation Images/LaTeX_PC.png){width=75%}
  + Click on the file at the bottom of your web browser and start the installation by pressing **Run**

![](~/Desktop/Welcome_A3SR/A3SR-Welcome-Package/Software Installation/Installation Images/LaTeX_PC_2.png){width=75%}
  + After following the on screen instructions, you will need to choose your settings. **Make sure to set Install missing packages on-the-fly to Yes** 

![](~/Desktop/Welcome_A3SR/A3SR-Welcome-Package/Software Installation/Installation Images/LaTeX_PC_3.png){width=75%}
  + You will be redirected to this screen and make sure to continue to press **Next** and follow the on-screen directions until the installation procress finishes. 

![](~/Desktop/Welcome_A3SR/A3SR-Welcome-Package/Software Installation/Installation Images/LaTeX_PC_4.png){width=75%}

* If you need to uninstall MiKTeX, restart your computer,
